text:
何より2度目の妊娠、再びの帝王切開という、自分には推し量ることしか出来ない大変な困難を越え、次女をこの世に送り出してくれた妻には感謝してもしきれません。 まだまだ痛みに耐えて戦ってくれています。 少しでも負担を減らせるよう寄り添って参ります。
いつも応援してくださる皆様に、心からの感謝を込めてご報告させていただきます。
trans:
Above all, I cannot express enough gratitude to my wife, who endured the immense challenge of a 2nd pregnancy and another cesarean section, something I can only imagine but never fully comprehend, to bring our 2nd daughter to this world. She is battling through the pain. I will do my best to stay by her side and ease her burden as much as I can.
I would like to share this news with heartfelt gratitude to everyone who has always supported us.
